text: 14:5 Dɨboboniba 11:29Ia bar, Godɨn Duamɨn otivaghirir mɨzebav kɨmasa, kɨ ifonge. Egh ia uaghan Godɨn otivir akabar gun mɨkɨmasa, kɨ guizbangɨra bar ifonge. Gumazim o amizim Godɨn Duamɨn otivaghirir mɨzebav kɨmtɨ, dagh ighavkɨnamin gumazitam ikɨva akabagh ighavkɨntɨ, siosɨn aven itir adarazi gavgavim iniam. Akam ighavkɨnamin gumaziba puvatɨghtɨ, gumazamizir Godɨn otivir akabar gun mɨgeiba, men ingangarim ekevegha, Godɨn Duamɨn otivaghirir mɨzebav geir gumazamizibar ingangarim gafira.
